data.text: Monkamfo Awurade!
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aka nneɛma akɛseɛ a Awurade ayɛ?
Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔkɔ so bu atɛntenenee,
Ao Awurade, sɛ wohunu wo nkurɔfoɔ mmɔbɔ a kae me.
na manya wɔn a wapa wɔn no yiedie mu kyɛfa,
Yɛayɛ bɔne sɛdeɛ yɛn nananom yɛeɛ no;
Ɛberɛ a yɛn nananom wɔ Misraim no,
Nanso, ne din enti ɔgyee wɔn nkwa,
Ɔteaa Ɛpo Kɔkɔɔ no ma ɛwee;
Ɔgyee wɔn firii ɔtamfoɔ no nsam;
Nsuo kataa wɔn atamfoɔ so;
Afei wɔgyee ne bɔhyɛ no diiɛ
Nanso, ntɛm so, wɔn werɛ firii deɛ wayɛ
Akɔnnɔ bɛhyɛɛ wɔn mu wɔ ɛserɛ so hɔ,
enti ɔmaa wɔn deɛ wɔbisaeɛ,
Na nsraban mu hɔ wɔn ani beree Mose
Asase mu buee na ɛmenee Datan
Egya tɔɔ wɔn akyidifoɔ no mu;
Wɔyɛɛ nantwie ba wɔ Horeb
Wɔsesaa wɔn Animuonyam.
Wɔn werɛ firii Onyankopɔn a ɔgyee wɔn nkwa,
nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɔyɛɛ wɔ Ham asase so
Enti ɔkaa sɛ ɔbɛsɛe wɔn,
Afei, wɔn ani ansɔ asase fɛfɛ no;
Wɔnwiinwii wɔ wɔn ntomadan mu
Enti ɔmaa ne nsa so kaa ntam kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ
ɔbɛma wɔn asefoɔ atotɔ wɔ amanaman mu
Wɔde wɔn ho bɔɔ Baal-peor ho
wɔde wɔn atirimuɔdensɛm hyɛɛ Awurade abufuo
Na Pinehas sɔre dii agyinamu,
Wɔde yei yɛɛ tenenee maa Pinehas
Meriba nsuo ho nso, wɔhyɛɛ Awurade abufuo,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔtee Onyankopɔn Honhom anim atua,
Wɔansɛe nnipa no
nanso wɔde wɔn ho frafraa amanaman no
Wɔsomm wɔn ahoni
Wɔde wɔn mmammarima
Wɔkaa mogya a ɛdi bem guiɛ;
Wɔde deɛ wɔyɛeɛ no guu wɔn ankasa ho fi;
Enti, Awurade bo fuu ne nkurɔfoɔ;
Ɔdanee wɔn maa amanaman no,
Wɔn atamfoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn so
Mpɛn bebree, Awurade gyee wɔn,
Nanso ɔhunuu wɔn ahohiahia
Wɔn enti, ɔkaee nʼapam no
Ɔmaa sodifoɔ a wɔafa wɔn nnommum no
Gye yɛn, Ao Awurade yɛn nkwagyeɛ Onyankopɔn,
Ayɛyie nka Awurade, Israel Onyankopɔn,
